roleset.name: thirst

example.name: from Google
example.text: Turner has long thirsted for his own network.

roleset.note: Automatically created based on framefiles: long (32.2), hand-checked by Kevin; adjectival 'thirsty' based on BOLT-6. Member of Vncls long-32.2-1, long-32.2-2.

example.name: adjectival rel: thirsty
example.text: We should encourage people to be Lei Feng by simply learning from Lei Feng . The only person who lent a helping hand to save a little girl by the name of Yueyue was a woman who collects refuse , but she was misconstrued as someone who-1 [*-1] is thirsty for fame .
